doc:
Rubye De Remer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rubye_De_Remer 0 Rubye De Remer (January 9, 1892 – March 18, 1984) was an American dancer and actress in silent films. Born Ruby Burkhardt, she began her stage career with the Midnight Frolic, a Florenz Ziegfeld show, in New York City. Rubye_De_Remer ( January_9_,_1892 – March_18_,_1984 ) was an_American_dancer_and_actress in silent_films . Born_Ruby_Burkhardt , she began her_stage_career with the_Midnight_Frolic , a_Florenz_Ziegfeld_show , in New_York_City .
